name: Angel Town 2 - singelplayer rpg game
description:
【On sale 50% off】
◆(○^～^○)On sale 50% off for a limited time，September 1～September 30!

◆#1 Strategy game in Taiwan on July 10
◆#2 Role playing game in Malaysia on July 8
◆#13 Strategy game in Thailand on July 11
◆#13 Role playing game in Mexico on July 7
◆#14 Strategy game in Japan on July 11
◆#18 Role playing game in France on July 10
◆#20 Role playing game in Korean on July 12
◆#34 Role playing game in Russia on July 12
◆#43 Strategy game in China on July 8

【No ads edition】
◆No annoying advertisements,have fun!

【Thank you for accompanying us for 3 years】
◆Angel Town , the world's most popular single-player offline RPG game 3 years ago!At the request of players,Angel Town 2 is on your iPhone ,iPod,and iPad!Thank you very much, every player!We will continue to work hard in the future to update the game.

—————————What's new—————————
【New gameplay】
O(∩_∩)O The player control angel more easily and more interesting!

【New levels】
(＝^ω^＝) The scenes are more beautiful,the levels are also more challenging.

【New angel】
(* ∩ _ ∩ *)We had adjusted the properties of all the angels.

【New function】
(●ω●) Automatic fighting, automatic placement, automatic pick up!

【More】
＼( ^▽^ )／ And..... more to come!

—————————Feedback—————————
◆We'd love to get your feedback.
◆E-mail:crabsoft@hotmail.com
◆Twitter:@Crabsoft

Good luck!Have fun!(○^～^○)
